description: Egypt gets an interim prime minister with an economics background, former finance minister Hazem el-Beblawi.
teaser: Egypt gets an interim prime minister with an economics background, former finance minister Hazem el-Beblawi.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 10, 2013
contentencoded:
Egypt’s newly appointed interim prime minister, economist and former finance minister Hazem el-Beblawi, is expected to name his cabinet today. Military leaders who seized power last week are still promising new elections early next year.

From Cairo, the BBC’s Middle East correspondent Jim Muir joins Marketplace Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss.
title: In Egypt, former finance minister named interim prime minister
